data.name: FlightTable
data.value: CREATE TABLE "Flight" (Id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, AirportId INTEGER NOT NULL, AirportId INTEGER NOT NULL, Departure TEXT NOT NULL, Arrival TEXT NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT FlightAirport FOREIGN KEY (AirportId) REFERENCES "Airport", CONSTRAINT FlightAirport FOREIGN KEY (AirportId) REFERENCES "Airport");

data.name: FlightView
data.value: CREATE VIEW FlightView AS SELECT Flight.Id, Flight.Departure, Flight.Arrival, OriginName.Name AS OriginName, OriginId.Id AS OriginId, DestinationName.Name AS DestinationName, DestinationId.Id AS DestinationId FROM Flight JOIN Airport ON Flight.AirportId = Airport.Id JOIN Airport ON Flight.AirportId = Airport.Id ORDER BY Flight.Id;

data.name: FlightCreate
data.value: INSERT INTO Flight (AirportId, AirportId, Departure, Arrival) VALUES (@AirportId, @AirportId, @Departure, @Arrival); SELECT last_insert_rowId();

data.name: AirportTable
data.value: CREATE TABLE "Airport" (Id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, Name TEXT NOT NULL, City TEXT NOT NULL, Country TEXT NOT NULL, Iata TEXT, Icao TEXT, Latitude DOUBLE NOT NULL, Longitude DOUBLE NOT NULL, Altitude DOUBLE NOT NULL, Timezone DOUBLE NOT NULL, DST TEXT NOT NULL);

data.name: AirportView
data.value: CREATE VIEW AirportView AS SELECT Airport.Id, Airport.Name, Airport.City, Airport.Country, Airport.Iata, Airport.Icao, Airport.Latitude, Airport.Longitude, Airport.Altitude, Airport.Timezone, Airport.DST, CAST(IFNULL(Flights.FlightCount,0) as int64) as Flights, CAST(IFNULL(Flights.FlightCount,0) as int64) as Flights FROM Airport LEFT JOIN (SELECT AirportId, Count(Flight.Id) AS FlightCount FROM Flight GROUP BY AirportId) Flights ON Airport.Id = Flights.AirportId LEFT JOIN (SELECT AirportId, Count(Flight.Id) AS FlightCount FROM Flight GROUP BY AirportId) Flights ON Airport.Id = Flights.AirportId ORDER BY Airport.Id;

data.name: AirportCreate
data.value: INSERT INTO Airport (Name, City, Country, Iata, Icao, Latitude, Longitude, Altitude, Timezone, DST) VALUES (@Name, @City, @Country, @Iata, @Icao, @Latitude, @Longitude, @Altitude, @Timezone, @DST); SELECT last_insert_rowId();

data.name: AirlineTable
data.value: CREATE TABLE "Airline" (Id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, Name TEXT NOT NULL, Alias TEXT, Iata TEXT, Icao TEXT, Callsign TEXT, Country TEXT, Active TEXT NOT NULL);

data.name: AirlineView
data.value: CREATE VIEW AirlineView AS SELECT Airline.Id, Airline.Name, Airline.Alias, Airline.Iata, Airline.Icao, Airline.Callsign, Airline.Country, Airline.Active FROM Airline ORDER BY Airline.Id;

data.name: AirlineCreate
data.value: INSERT INTO Airline (Name, Alias, Iata, Icao, Callsign, Country, Active) VALUES (@Name, @Alias, @Iata, @Icao, @Callsign, @Country, @Active); SELECT last_insert_rowId();
